publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2054 Murdo Fraser: Veterans Day—That the Parliament marks Veterans Day on Saturday 12 July 2008; notes that Veterans Day honours Scotland’s veterans past and present and acknowledges their heroic service to protect Scotland; welcomes the role of Stirling as Scotland’s focus for this year’s annual commemorations, with highlights including a pipers’ trail procession from Stirling Castle through the city centre, a Gala Day with an RAF Tornado flypast as well as music, displays and exhibitions and the UK’s first veterans-themed film festival; notes Stirling’s proud military history and believes that the city will show great gratitude to the present veterans; recognises that there are currently about 500,000 veterans living in Scotland, and believes that ex-servicemen and women should be given the level of care that reflects the service and commitment that they gave to protect our country.
S3M-2054 Veterans Day (lodged on 3 June 2008) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-2054 Murdo Fraser: Veterans Day—That the Parliament marks Veterans Day on Friday 27 June 2008; notes that Veterans Day honours Scotland’s veterans past and present and acknowledges their heroic service to protect Scotland; welcomes the role of Stirling as Scotland’s focus for this year’s annual commemorations, with highlights including a pipers’ trail procession from Stirling Castle through the city centre, a Gala Day with an RAF Tornado flypast as well as music, displays and exhibitions and the UK’s first veterans-themed film festival; notes Stirling’s proud military history and believes that the city will show great gratitude to the present veterans; recognises that there are currently about 500,000 veterans living in Scotland, and believes that ex-servicemen and women should be given the level of care that reflects the service and commitment that they gave to protect our country. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn

S3M-2054 Veterans Day (lodged on 3 June 2008) Jackson Carlaw*, John Lamont*, Christine Grahame*, Margaret Mitchell*, Derek Brownlee*, John Scott*, Ken Macintosh*, Bill Kidd*, Des McNulty*, Ted Brocklebank*, Mary Scanlon*, Jim Tolson*, Liam McArthur*, John Park*, Jamie Stone*, Jamie McGrigor*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-2054 Veterans Day (lodged on 3 June 2008) Stuart McMillan*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Bill Aitken*
S3M-2054 Veterans Day (lodged on 3 June 2008) Nanette Milne*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-2054 Veterans Day (lodged on 3 June 2008) Angela Constance*
S3M-2054 Veterans Day (lodged on 3 June 2008) Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-2054 Veterans Day (lodged on 3 June 2008) Annabel Goldie*
S3M-2054 Veterans Day (lodged on 3 June 2008) Tom McCabe*
